Wastewater overflow forces cancellation of swimming leg at kids TRYathlon in Auckland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wastewater-overflow-forces-cancellation-of-swimming-leg-at-kids-tryathlon-in-auckland/PAWW5ZGEUJBJFOLLKHL6ZGYBNM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wastewater-overflow-forces-cancellation-of-swimming-leg-at-kids-tryathlon-in-auckland/PAWW5ZGEUJBJFOLLKHL6ZGYBNM/ 'It's so disappointing for kids who have been training', says a mother Sun, 24 Mar 2024 00:37:13 +0000 Kids run along the beach at Pt England Reserve as the Weetbix TRYathlon is reduced to a duathlon after the swimming section was cancelled due to poor water quality. Photo / Alex Burton

Sat, 23 Mar 2024 23:00:00 +0000 The attackers were all members or associates of the Black Power gang. Photo / NZME
Walker badly injured by Whangārei Loop footbridge ‘safety’ screens https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/pedestrian-seriously-injured-by-whangareis-loop-walk-footbridge-safety-screens/JFS4JDIKCFFQHGGZJMH4KWPNGM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/pedestrian-seriously-injured-by-whangareis-loop-walk-footbridge-safety-screens/JFS4JDIKCFFQHGGZJMH4KWPNGM/ Sarah CurtisThe wife of a badly injured man says an unsafe footbridge should have simply been closed. Sat, 23 Mar 2024 23:00:00 +0000 Barbara Greenhalgh is shocked by the irony of what happened to her husband Peter this week after council contractors failed to assess hazards before trying to install "safety" screens amid high wind on the Kotuitui Whitinga footbridge. Cones now mark the hazardous area and scrim, a piece of which had struck Peter at force, has been removed. Photo / Michael Cunningham
